body:
I feel as if crudeness should not be allowed, I mean like making a big penis on a map it is annoying because the chat gets spammed with "Wtf" or "HAHAHAHHA" or "LOOLOLOL" OR "i'M GOING TO GET MY MOD FRIEND TO BAN YOU!!!" it annoyed me so much in this game, If this is not allowed tell me but I have never seen anyone get banned for this or warned or temped.


Screen shots : http://imgur.com/letZIHE,jreyujf#0


PS. I am not sulking just saying this is annoying for game play :D but it is pertty funny.
